summary: Wagyu Stars Sponsorship of PGA Caddie Henry Diana Proves Out of this World in Texas Children’s Open Victory - WSWagyu Stars, known for its commitment to excellence and unparalleled quality in the culinary world, jumped at the opportunity to elevate its brand presence in the world of golf by sponsoring longtime PGA caddie Henry Diana. The partnership proved to be a stroke of genius as Diana's expertise and guidance significantly contributed to Stephan Jaeger's triumphant victory at the Texas Children’s Hospital Open on Easter Sunday, March 31, 2024.
